name: Super Hero:Honor
description:
In this adventure game, all you can rely on is a submachine gun. Ahead of you is a vast waste land full of traps where heavily armed enemy soldiers are patrolling around. The objective of yours is to break the blockades by dodging those bullets and lethal traps. Take down your enemies and make the flag of your glory raised up high.

Features:
1. Breathtaking background music.
2. Styled action moves to grant you mind-blowing game experience.
3. Epic battle scene and stunning effect graphics, your most exhilarating adventure game.
4. Grab your submachine gun and let the battle begin.
